an5.137:1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, appaṁ rattiyā supanti, bahuṁ jagganti.
an5.137:1.3: Itthī, bhikkhave, purisādhippāyā appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.4: Puriso, bhikkhave, itthādhippāyo appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.5: Coro, bhikkhave, ādānādhippāyo appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.6: Rājā, bhikkhave, rājakaraṇīyesu yutto appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.7: Bhikkhu, bhikkhave, visaṁyogādhippāyo appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca appaṁ rattiyā supanti, bahuṁ jaggantī”ti.
